    • Method Detail

      • calcLongitudeOffset

        protected static double calcLongitudeOffset(double latitude,
                                            double distance)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the longitude offset of a point which is distance kilometers away
        Parameters:
        latitude - Latitude of the initial point
        distance - displacement of the point whose longitude offset is calculated
        Returns:
        longitude degree offset of a point distance kilometers away
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - invalid latitude data: latitude outside [-90,90]

      • calcLatitudeOffset

        protected static double calcLatitudeOffset(double distance)
        Calculates the latitude offset of a point which is distance kilometers away
        Parameters:
        distance - displacement of the point whose latitude offset is calculated
        Returns:
        latitude degree offset of a point distance kilometers away

      • calcDistanceBetweenPoints

        protected static double calcDistanceBetweenPoints(double lat1,
                                                  double lon1,
                                                  double lat2,
                                                  double lon2)
                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the distance between two points given in longitude/latitude format.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - Latitude of point #1
        lon1 - Longitude of point #1
        lat2 - Latitude of point #2
        lon2 - Longitude of point #2
        Returns:
        distance in kilometers [double]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - invalid longitude or latitude data: longitude outside [-180,180] or latitude outside [-90,90]
        See Also:
        ://stackoverflow.com/questions/18861728/calculating-distance-between -two-points-represented-by-lat-long-upto-15-feet-acc
